channel.title: First steps on Connector 365 Online Help
channel.description: Recent content in First steps on Connector 365 Online Help

item.title: Introduction
item.description: First steps Introduction When you send emails via Microsoft Dynamics 365 Business Central, the system automatically generates a subject line for you. However, this automatically generated subject contains only your company name, the type of document and the number. This is often not enough, and you then have to manually add something to the generated subject or change it altogether because your company has certain requirements for your subject lines.

item.title: Test & purchase
item.description: Test and purchase the Connector 365 Mail Subject Plus Here you can find all important information and notices for testing and purchasing the Connector 365 Mail Subject Plus App. Just use either the bottom or left navigation menu. In case a question could not be answered, we will be glad to help you personally. You can find the necessary contact information on the support page.

item.title: Installation
item.description: Installing the Connector 365 Mail Subject Plus App Here you will find all the important information and instructions on how to install the Connector 365 Mail Subject Plus App. Simply use either the bottom or left navigation menu. In case a question could not be answered, we will be happy to help you personally. You can find the necessary contact information on the support page.

item.title: Setup
item.description: Setting up the Connector 365 Mail Subject Plus app. Here you will find all the important information and instructions on how to set up the Connector 365 Mail Subject Plus App. Just use either the bottom or left navigation menu. In case a question could not be answered for you, we will be happy to help you personally. You can find the necessary contact information on the support page.
